original_text: The king made silver as common in Jerusalem as stones, and cedar as plentiful as sycamore-fig trees in the foothills.
korean_text: 왕이 예루살렘에서 은을 돌 같이 흔하게 하고 백향목을 평지의 뽕나무 같이 많게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: The king made silver as common in Jerusalem as stones
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 예루살렘에서 은을 돌처럼 흔하게 만들었다

sentences.original_text: and cedar as plentiful as sycamore-fig trees in the foothills
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 저지대에 무화과나무처럼 백향목을 풍부하게 만들었다
